remarks: The evaluation map has the intended behavior on the generators. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Oct-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-Feb-2016.)
statement:
frgpup.b $e |- B = ( Base ` H ) $.
frgpup.n $e |- N = ( invg ` H ) $.
frgpup.t $e |- T = ( y e. I , z e. 2o |-> if ( z = (/) , ( F ` y ) , ( N ` ( F ` y ) ) ) ) $.
frgpup.h $e |- ( ph -> H e. Grp ) $.
frgpup.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. V ) $.
frgpup.a $e |- ( ph -> F : I --> B ) $.
frgpup.w $e |- W = ( _I ` Word ( I X. 2o ) ) $.
frgpup.r $e |- .~ = ( ~FG ` I ) $.
frgpup.g $e |- G = ( freeGrp ` I ) $.
frgpup.x $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
frgpup.e $e |- E = ran ( g e. W |-> <. [ g ] .~ , ( H gsum ( T o. g ) ) >. ) $.
frgpup.u $e |- U = ( varFGrp ` I ) $.
frgpup3.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. ( G GrpHom H ) ) $.
frgpup3.e $e |- ( ph -> ( K o. U ) = F ) $.
frgpup3lem $p |- ( ph -> K = E ) $.
$d .~ g $.
$d B g y z $.
$d F y z $.
$d H g $.
$d I y z $.
$d N y z $.
$d T g $.
$d W g $.
$d g ph y z $.
